autumn.lang.compiler.ast.commons

Interface IDocumented

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IConstruct
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IRecord
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnnotationDefinition, DesignDefinition, EnumDefinition, ExceptionDefinition, FunctionDefinition, FunctorDefinition, ModuleDirective, StructDefinition, TupleDefinition

    public interface IDocumented
extends IConstruct
    An instance of this interface is an AST node that has a documentation comment applied to it.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DocComment getComment()
      This method gets the doc-comment that is applied to this construct.

      This method sets the doc-comment that is applied to this construct.
